snippet: Some New Yorkers who want to avoid trains and traffic, and who have a few thousand dollars to spare, charter helicopters to East Hampton.
abstract: Some New Yorkers who want to avoid trains and traffic, and who have a few thousand dollars to spare, charter helicopters to the Hamptons.
lead_paragraph: Some New Yorkers who want to avoid trains and traffic, and who have a few thousand dollars to spare, charter helicopters to East Hampton.

headline.seo: Sparing No Expense for a Copter Ride to the Hamptons
